issue.title: Upgrade Playwright to v1.42

labels.name: [Type] Automated Testing
labels.description: Testing infrastructure changes impacting the execution of end-to-end (E2E) and/or unit tests.

repository.name: gutenberg
repository.description: The Block Editor project for WordPress and beyond. Plugin is available from the official repository.

issue.body:
## What?
Upgrade Playwright to v1.41.2

## What's new?

https://github.com/microsoft/playwright/releases/tag/v1.41.0
https://github.com/microsoft/playwright/releases/tag/v1.42.0

## Testing Instructions
* Run any e2e test locally; the command should download new browsers and run the test successfully.
* CI checks are green.

body:

issue.title: Revert "chore(role): cache element list by role (#29130)"

repository.name: playwright
repository.description: Playwright is a framework for Web Testing and Automation. It allows testing Chromium, Firefox and WebKit with a single API.

issue.body:
This reverts commit 1ce3ca25a2676ca773a736035699cf3fe0c35d0d.

Added a regression test.

Fixes #29760.
